data.message: Why Eastbourne? Most of the people there are so old they can't make it or don't  drink it anyway.

replies.message: That's very ageist🙀!! I love Coke and Have drank Coke since being a child and will continue to do so!! I'm an OAP but I can still go places!! All the more reason to go to Eastbourne so the "old people" won't have far travel!! We may be older but we still like very similar things!! Oh I could go on!!

Elaine Joan Lewis  I'm sure you do like it and you have every right to do so. But I can put money on the fact that their key demographic for advertising to aren't you. I don't mean any offence by that, I'm just saying how it is. There are young families and children in Eastbourne, yes. But I'll bet there are a lot more in Brighton.
Bianca Davis-Veness wow. Love you too.
